column_desc: Model Code: Primary key for MH_MODEL_MASTER. Uniquely identifies a vehicle model. Used to join with MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.
Model Description: Text description of the vehicle model.
Model Group Code: Code representing the group to which the model belongs.
Variant Code: Code identifying the variant of the vehicle model.
Seat Capacity: Number of seats in the vehicle model.
Model Invoice Description: Description used for invoicing this model.
Family Code: Code representing the family grouping of the model.
Color Code: Code representing the color of the vehicle model.
Product Division: Name or code of the product division for this model.
Batch: Batch identifier for the vehicle model.
OEM Model Code: Code assigned by the OEM for this model.
Sales Model Group: Grouping used for sales categorization.
Model Group Order By: Integer for ordering within the model group.
Segment Code: Code representing the segment of the vehicle model.
Variant Description: Description of the vehicle variant.
Family Description: Description of the model family.
Active Indicator: Indicates if the model is active.
Model Group Description: Description of the model group.
Fuel Type: Type of fuel used by the vehicle model.
Emission: Emission standard or value for the vehicle model.
Drive: Drive type of the vehicle model (e.g., FWD, RWD).
Trim Level: Trim level of the vehicle model.
Transmission: Transmission type of the vehicle model.
Dealer Name: Name of the dealer in the sales and service hierarchy.
Product Division: Product division code or name associated with the dealer.
Active Indicator: Indicates whether the dealer is active.
Parent Group Code: Code representing the parent group of the dealer.
Location Name: Name of the dealer's location.
Location Code: Code representing the dealer's location. Used to join with MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.
Dealer Code: Primary key for MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION. Uniquely identifies a dealer.
Area Name: Name of the sales area for the dealer.
Zone Name: Name of the sales zone for the dealer.
ASM Name: Area Sales Manager's name associated with the dealer.
CCM Name: Customer Care Manager's name associated with the dealer.
RSM Name: Regional Sales Manager's name associated with the dealer.
RCCM Name: Regional Customer Care Manager's name associated with the dealer.
Zonal Head Sales: Name of the zonal head for sales.
Zonal Head Customer Care: Name of the zonal head for customer care.
RO Number: Repair Order number associated with the customer feedback verbatim.
Service RO Header SK: Foreign key to MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS. Links customer feedback to repair order headers.
Demanded Verbatim: Text of the specific issue or request stated by the customer.
Verbatim Group: Code representing the group/category of the verbatim issue.
Verbatim Code: Code identifying the specific type of customer issue.
Customer Verbatim Description: Detailed description of the customer's issue or request.
Verbatim Group Description: Description of the verbatim group/category.
Service RO Header SK: Foreign key to MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS. Links labor records to repair order headers.
Service RO Bill Header SK: Identifier for the service repair order bill header.This key is used to join the MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS WITH  MH_RO_LABOUR TABLE.
Service RO Bill Labour Detail SK: Primary key for MH_RO_LABOUR. Uniquely identifies a labor detail record.
Standard Hours: Number of standard hours assigned for the labor task.
Service Labour Master SK: Identifier for the service labor master record.
Labour Description: Description of the labor task performed.
Labour Tax: Tax amount applied to the labor task.
Labour Amount: Amount charged for the labor task before discounts and taxes.
Labour Rate: Rate per hour or per task for the labor performed.
Labour Charged Hours: Number of hours charged for the labor task.
Labour Discount Amount: Discount applied to the labor amount.
Labour Total Amount: Total amount for labor after applying discounts and taxes.
Total Bill Amount: Total bill amount for the labor record, including all charges.
Labour Billable Type Name: Name of the billable type for labor (e.g., warranty, paid, free).
Labour Type Name: Type or category of the labor performed.
Labour Group Name: Group or classification of the labor task.
Labour Code: Group or classification of the labor Group.
Service RO Header SK: Foreign key to MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS. Links part records to repair order headers.

Service RO Bill Header SK: Identifier for the service repair order bill header.Identifier for the service repair order bill header.This key is used to join the MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS WITH  MH_RO_PARTS TABLE.
Service RO Bill Part Detail SK: Primary key for MH_RO_PARTS. Uniquely identifies a part detail record.
Part Code: Code identifying the part used in the repair order.
Part Description: Description of the part used in the repair order.
Part Quantity: Quantity of the part used in the repair order.
Part Rate: Rate per unit for the part used.
Part Amount: Amount charged for the part before discounts and taxes.
Part Tax: Tax amount applied to the part.
Part Discount Amount: Discount applied to the part amount.
Part Total Amount: Total amount for the part after applying discounts and taxes.
OEM Part Indicator: Indicates if the part is an OEM part or a local part. It is a BOOLEAN FIELD. If a Part is OEM part then it is Y else if the part is a Local part then it stores N.
ABC Indicator: ABC classification indicator for the part.
HML Indicator: HML classification indicator for the part.
Landed Cost: Landed cost of the part, including all expenses.
RIS Indicator: RIS classification indicator for the part.
Purchase Price: Purchase price of the part.
Selling Price: Selling price of the part.
MRP: Maximum Retail Price of the part.
HSN: Harmonized System Nomenclature code for the part.
Net Dealer Price: Net price for the dealer after all adjustments.
Discount Rate: Discount rate applied to the part.
GNDP: Gross Net Dealer Price for the part.
NDP: Net Dealer Price for the part.
Bill Share: Share of the bill attributed to this part.
Total Bill Amount: Total bill amount for the part record, including all charges.
Part Category Description: Description of the part's category.
Part Billable Type Name: Name of the billable type for the part (e.g., warranty, paid, free).
Discount Type Name: Name of the discount type applied to the part.
Product Division Name: Name of the product division for the part.
Part Type Name: Type or category of the part used in the repair order.
Part Category Group: Group or classification of the part's category.
Common Part Category: Common category assigned to the part across multiple models or repairs.
Category1: Additional categorization for the part as per business logic.
RO Cancel Date: Date when the repair order was cancelled.It is used to join when users asks a query based on repair order cancel date.
Spot Care Applied Flag: Indicates if spot care was applied to the repair order.
Vehicle TOE Indicator: Indicates if the vehicle is classified as TOE (Type of Equipment).
VIN: Vehicle Identification Number of the vehicle which is there for repair and forms the part of repair order.
RO Date: Date when the repair order was opened or created.It is used to join when users asks a query based on repair order open date or repair order creation date.
RO DateTime: Timestamp for when the repair order was opened or created.
Bill Date: Date when the repair order or ro or ro_id was billed.
Bill DateTime: Timestamp for when the repair order or ro or ro_id was billed.
RO Closed Date: Date when the repair order or ro or ro_id was closed.
RO Status: Current status of the repair order or ro or ro_id .
Odometer Reading: Odometer reading of the vehicle at the time of repair order creation.
Service Appointment Header SK: Identifier for the associated service appointment.
RO Bill Date: Date when the repair order or ro or ro_id bill was generated.
Cancel Date: Date when the repair order or ro or ro_id was cancelled (alternate field).
Service RO Header SK: Primary key for MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS to identify any Repair Order or RO or RO_ID. This is related to RO_ID column on one to one basis.Used to join with MH_CUST_VERBATIM TABLE.
Parent Group: Code or name for the parent group associated with the repair order.
Location Code: References dealer/location in MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION. Used for joining repair orders to dealer and sales hierarchy.

RO_ID also known as repair order or RO or RO Number or RO No or RO NUM or RO ID: key column used to look  a specefic repair order. It is related to sv_ro_hdr_sk on one to one basis. When users asks a question based on any RO Number or RO ID or RO then this key is used to get the columns sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk to join the table MH_RO_PARTS and sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk to join the table MH_RO_LABOUR tables.
Parts Total Amount: Total amount billed for parts in the repair order.
Labour Total Amount: Total amount billed for labor in the repair order.
Document Amount: Total document amount for the repair order.
Parts Basic Amount: Basic amount for parts before taxes and discounts.
Labour Basic Amount: Basic amount for Labour before taxes and discounts.
Service Advisor Employee Name: Name of the service advisor handling the repair order.
Promised Delivery Date: Date promised for vehicle delivery to the customer.
Revised Promised Delivery Date: Revised date promised for vehicle delivery.
Revisit Indicator: Indicates if the repair order is a revisit.
Model Code: Foreign key to MH_MODEL_MASTER. Used for joining repair orders to vehicle model master data.
Service RO Bill Header SK: Identifier for the repair order bill header. This key is used to join the MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS WITH MH_RO_PARTS TABLE AND MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS WITH MH_RO_LABOUR TABLE
Online Payment Flag: Indicates if the repair order was paid online.
Segment Code: Code representing the segment of the vehicle for the repair order.
Express Service Indicator: Indicates if the repair order was for express service.
Chassis Number: Chassis number of the vehicle in the repair order.
Key Account Segment: Key account segment classification for the repair order.
Government Vehicle: Indicates if the vehicle is a government vehicle.
Color Code: Code representing the color of the vehicle for the repair order.
OEM Model Code: OEM-assigned model code for the vehicle in the repair order.
Product Division: Product division associated with the repair order.
Part Charge Amount: Amount charged for parts in the repair order.
Labour Charge Amount: Amount charged for labour in the repair order.
SDD Flag: Indicates if Same Day Delivery was applicable for the repair order.

RO Greater Than 72 Hours: Indicates if repair order duration exceeded 72 hours. It stores the value of column sv_ro_hdr_sk for repair order duration exceeding 72 hours else it stores 0.It is not a BOOLEAN field.

RO Less Than or Equal To 72 Hours: Indicates if repair order duration was 72 hours or less.It stores the value of column sv_ro_hdr_sk for repair order duration IS equal to less Than 72 hours else it stores 0.It is not a BOOLEAN field.

RO Less Than or Equal To 48 Hours: Indicates if repair order duration was 48 hours or less.It stores the value of column sv_ro_hdr_sk for repair order duration IS equal to less Than 48 hours else it stores 0.It is not a BOOLEAN field.

RO Less Than or Equal To 24 Hours: Indicates if repair order duration was 24 hours or less.It stores the value of column sv_ro_hdr_sk for repair order duration IS equal to less Than 24 hours else it stores 0.It is not a BOOLEAN field.
RO Close Difference: Number of days or hours between expected and actual close of the repair order.
TEA Flag: Special flag for TEA (business-specific meaning).
CEA Flag: Special flag for CEA (business-specific meaning).
MTRAQ Flag: Flag indicating MTRAQ status for the repair order.
M1 M2 M3 M4: Consolidated field for multiple business-specific indicators.
Key: General-purpose key or identifier for the repair order.
RO Key: Specific key associated with the repair order.
Key Employee: Employee key or identifier associated with the repair order.
Key Bay: Bay key or identifier for the repair order.
RO Day Closed: Number of days taken to close the repair order.
Original Warranty Start Date: The date when the original warranty started for the vehicle.
RSA Registration Status: Status of RSA (Roadside Assistance) registration for the repair order.
Max TO Days from DOS: Maximum number of TO (Turn Over) days from Date of Service.
Arrived Date for Eligibility: Date when the vehicle arrived for eligibility assessment.
RSA Registration Flag: Indicates if RSA registration is flagged for the repair order.
RSA Expiry Date: Expiry date of the RSA (Roadside Assistance) for the vehicle.
Eligible Vehicle Flag: Indicates if the vehicle is eligible for a particular service or benefit.
Original Warranty Expiry Date: The date when the original warranty expires for the vehicle.
Original Warranty Expiry KM: Odometer reading (in kilometers) at which the original warranty expires for the vehicle.
Warranty Flag: Indicates whether the repair order or vehicle is under warranty.
Valid To: Date until which the repair order, warranty, or service is valid.
Shield Validity Flag: Indicates whether the shield protection or coverage is currently valid.
Scheme Expiry Date: Expiry date of any special scheme or offer associated with the repair order.
Shield Registration Flag: Indicates whether the vehicle or repair order is registered for shield protection.
MRP: Maximum Retail Price relevant to the repair order or parts.
NDP: Net Dealer Price associated with the repair order or parts.
Part Quantity: Quantity of parts used or billed in the repair order.
Ageing Bucket: Numeric value indicating the ageing category or bucket for the repair order or parts.
Brought By Name: Name of the person who brought the vehicle for service.
Vehicle Brought By: Name or identifier of the person who brought the vehicle.
Service Advisor Feedback Status: Status of feedback provided by the service advisor.
Accessories Flag: Indicates if accessories were involved in the repair order.
Division Key: Key or code for the division associated with the repair order.
Registration Number: Vehicle registration number associated with the repair order.
RO Remarks: Remarks or notes regarding the repair order.
Bay Active Indicator: Indicates if the service bay was active for the repair order.
Applied To: Indicates what the repair order or service was applied to.
Warranty Ageing RO: Ageing value related to warranty for the repair order.
Warranty Ageing Today: Ageing value for warranty as of today.
Service Type Description: Description of the type of service performed in the repair order.
Service Category Description: Description of the service category for the repair order.
Model Color Key: Key representing the model and color combination for the vehicle.
RO Source Name: Name of the source from which the repair order originated.
Service Type Name: Name of the service type for the repair order.
Repair Order Same Day Delay Reason: Reason for delay in same-day repair order completion.
Estimation Variation Reason: Reason for variation in repair order cost or time estimation.
Repair Order Cancel Reason: Reason for cancellation of the repair order.
Repair Order Delay Reason: Reason for any delay in completion of the repair order.
Pendency Reason: Reason for any pendency or hold on the repair order.
Time Revision Approval Reason: Reason for approval of time revision in the repair order.
Cost Revision Approval Reason: Reason for approval of cost revision in the repair order.
Pickup Type Name: Name of the pickup type for the repair order or service.
Drop Type Name: Name of the drop type for the repair order or service.
RO Document Type Name: Name of the document type for the repair order.
Bill Type Name: Name of the bill type for the repair order.
Service Campaign Type Name: Name of the service campaign type for the repair order.
Technician Employee Name: Name of the technician who performed the service.
Product Division Name: Name of the product division associated with the repair order.
Taxi Indicator: Indicates if the vehicle is classified as a taxi. It is not a BOOLEAN field. IT stores the values as NON TAXI OR TAXI.
Bay Type Name: Name or type of the service bay used for the repair order.
Revisit Flag: Indicates if the repair order is a revisit.
Repeat Repair Flag: Indicates if the repair order is for a repeat repair.
Service Group: Group or category of the service performed in the repair order.
